title.bibl: Otthon, Aug. 30, 1931. Hungarian Curative Cosmetic Enterprise in Chicago

div.bibl: Otthon, Aug. 30, 1931. HUNGARIAN CURATIVE COSMETIC ENTERPRISE IN CHICAGO

body.p: p.2. Joseph Jahn, popular Hungarian business man, has opened a factory for the manufacture of curative cosmetics. He will manufacture among other products, medicated bath salts.
Pin-o-zone products will be sold in drug stores in Hungarian districts.
The technical department of the factory will be in the capable hands of Ede John, well-known chemist whose reputation is a guarantee as to the excellent quality of the products.
We ask our readers to give their support to this worthy Hungarian business venture.
